EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Riddle of Fire
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
While you are Centered, you can use your Wisdom modifier to hit. Each Core Enhancement in the Henshin Mystic tree, including this one, grants you the following passive effects:
+3 Melee Power +2 Fire Resistance +3 PRR +1 bonus Imbue Dice Enemies have -2 Fire Resistance against your spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Ki Bolt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Ki Spell-Like Ability: Ki Bolt Activation Cost: 5 Ki Cooldown: 3 seconds Ki Spell-Like Ability: You fire a Ki blast that deals 1d6 Fire and 1d4 Force damage per Caster Level to an opponent. This damage scales with 3x Melee Power. The target also gains a stack of Weakened Will, Feeble Fortitude, and Reduced Reflexes. (-1 Saving Throws, 6 second duration. Can stack up to 5 times.) This ability has double normal spell range.
Passive: While you are Centered, you can use your Wisdom modifier to damage and you gain +2 Ki each time you hit a creature with a melee attack. This stacks with all other sources of Ki generation.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Cauldron of Flame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Fire Ki Spell-Like Ability: You will flame into the world around you. Enemies around you take 1d2 Fire damage per Monk level every 2 seconds, increasing by an additional 1d2 Fire damage per Monk level every 2 seconds that you remain standing in the flames. This damage scales with 2x Melee Power. If you leave the area of the flames, this effect ends. A successful Reflex save (DC 10 + Monk Level + Wisdom Mod + Stunning Bonuses) reduces damage by half. While you remain inside your Cauldron of Flames, you personally gain PRR equal to your Monk level, MRR equal to your Monk level, and Dodge that ignores Dodge Cap equal to 5 + half your Monk Level. Activation Cost: 30 Ki Cooldown: 1 minute

Stance.Name: Cauldron Of Flame
Stance.Description: You are fighting within your Cauldron of Flame

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Incinerating Wave
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Fire Ki Spell-Like Ability: Incinerating Wave Activation Cost: 20 Ki Cooldown: 9 seconds Fire Ki Spell-Like Ability: You produce a wall of Ki flame that travels away from you, dealing 1d6+3 Fire and Force damage per Caster Level every 2 seconds to all opponents near it. This damage scales with 3x Melee Power. A successful Reflex save (DC 10 + Monk Level + Wisdom Mod + Stunning Bonuses) reduces damage by half.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Improved Cauldron
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The cooldown on Cauldron of Flame is now halved. You may now move a small range outside your Cauldron without it collapsing.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Serenity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your understanding of things has evolved to a level that defies description. Passive: +4 Wisdom +10 Concentration +1 Passive Ki Generation +12 Melee Power (in addition to the +3 you get for each Core, for a total of +15) While inside your Cauldron of Flame and Cantered, +5 to Attack and Damage, +1 Critical Multiplier.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Porous Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Deals +10% Damage Cost: 10 Ki Cooldown: 6 seconds Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent and speak the secret words that cause them to draw Acid in like a sponge. On Hit: Target takes 1d6 Acid Damage +1 Acid Damage per Monk level, and takes 10% more Acid Damage for 30 seconds.
This ability shares a cooldown with the other Elemental Words abilities.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Henshin Training I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to hit and damage while Centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Ki Shout
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: Intimidates nearby enemies, encouraging them to attack you. This ability uses your Concentration skill, and shares a cooldown with the Intimidate skill. Activation Cost: 5 Ki. Cooldown: 6 seconds

DC.Name: Ki Shout
DC.Description: Ki Activate: Intimidates nearby enemies, encouraging them to attack you. This ability uses your Concentration skill, and shares a cooldown with the Intimidate skill. Activation Cost: 5 Ki. Cooldown: 6 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Exemplar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Heal and Intimidate. +[5/10/15]% Attack Speed with Quarterstaves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Animal Forms
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You emulate a creature of nature in your training.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Clever Monkey
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a monkey, no trap in the world can catch you. You gain +1 to your haggle skill and all saves against traps, as well as energy resistance 2. At Monk levels 3, 9, and 15, the skill and save bonuses increase by 1 and energy resistance increases by 2.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Elegant Crane
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a crane, you strike with precision and elegance. You gain +1 to your Diplomacy skill, and generate 1 additional Ki on critical hits. Your training has left you more fragile than normal, however, and have a -1 penalty to Fortitude saves. At Monk levels 3, 9, and 15, these bonuses and penalties increase by 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Faithful Hound
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a hound, you are ever vigilant and at home amidst the pack. You gain +1 to your Listen skill and a +2 bonus to hit flanked opponents. At Monk levels 3, 9, and 15, the bonuses increase by 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Patient Tortoise
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a tortoise, you are calm at heart and worries wash over you. You gain +1 to your Concentration skill and 5 additional hit points. At Monk levels 3, 9, and 15, the skill bonus increases by 1 and hit point bonus increases by 5.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Way of the Tenacious Badger
EnhancementSelection.Description: Like a badger, you are most dangerous when grievously injured. You gain +1 to your Intimidate skill, and whenever you are below 50% health, your passive Ki regeneration is increased by 1 and you deal +0.25[W] additional damage. Your patience has suffered, however, and you generate Ki slower when meditating. At Monk levels 3, 9, and 15, the skill bonus increases by 1 and the damage bonus increases by +0.25[W].

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Elemental Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Taking this Enhancement grants you four Imbue Toggles, in Fire, Cold, Electric, and Acid. When toggled, you enhance your attacks with Ki, dealing 1d6 (Element) damage on hit, and an additional 1d6 Force damage on critical. You Ki spells also apply the (Element) portion of this damage. This damage scales with 150% of the highest of Melee and Ranged Power.

Stance.Name: Elemental Soul: Fire
Stance.Description: When toggled, you enhance your attacks with Ki, dealing 1d6 Fire damage on hit, and an additional 1d6 Force damage on critical. You Ki spells also apply the Fire portion of this damage. This damage scales with 150% of the highest of Melee and Ranged Power.

Stance.Name: Elemental Soul: Cold
Stance.Description: When toggled, you enhance your attacks with Ki, dealing 1d6 Cold damage on hit, and an additional 1d6 Force damage on critical. You Ki spells also apply the Cold portion of this damage. This damage scales with 150% of the highest of Melee and Ranged Power.

Stance.Name: Elemental Soul: Electric
Stance.Description: When toggled, you enhance your attacks with Ki, dealing 1d6 Electric damage on hit, and an additional 1d6 Force damage on critical. You Ki spells also apply the Electric portion of this damage. This damage scales with 150% of the highest of Melee and Ranged Power.

Stance.Name: Elemental Soul: Acid
Stance.Description: When toggled, you enhance your attacks with Ki, dealing 1d6 Acid damage on hit, and an additional 1d6 Force damage on critical. You Ki spells also apply the Acid portion of this damage. This damage scales with 150% of the highest of Melee and Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Henshin Training II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and +2 to Damage while Centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Elemental Ki Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four attacks that have secondary after effects: (Activation Cost: 5 Ki. Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Eagle Claw Attack
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +20% Damage Activation Cost: 5 Ki Cooldown: 3 seconds Fire Ki Melee Attack: Your attacks can shatter objects. You strike at weak points in your opponents armor or hide, applying four stacks of Armor Destruction. (Each stack reduces Armor Class by 1 and Fortification by 1% for 20 seconds. This effect can stack up to 15 times.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fists of Iron
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +30% Damage Activation Cost: 5 Ki +1 Critical Multiplier +1 Critical Threat Range Cooldown: 3 seconds Earth Ki Melee Attack: You have imbued your attacks with extra force.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knock on the Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +10% Damage Activation Cost: 5 Ki Cooldown: 3 seconds Air Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent, deflecting their momentum. Your enemy deals 4% less physical damage for 30 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Unbalancing Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +30% Damage Activation Cost: 5 Ki Cooldown: 3 seconds Water Ki Melee Attack: You have learned several joint strikes. You can attack these weak points of your opponent, throwing them off balance for a short period of time. This reduces their armor class by 2, applies a -10 penalty to their Balance skill, and renders them vulnerable to sneak attacks. A successful Reflex save negates this effect (DC 10 + Half Monk Level + Wisdom modifier + Trip modifiers). The target receives periodic saves to attempt to break free of this effect.

DC.Name: Henshin Mystic: Unbalancing Strike
DC.Description: Deals +30% Damage Cooldown: 3 seconds Water Ki Melee Attack: You have learned several joint strikes. You can attack these weak points of your opponent, throwing them off balance for a short period of time. This reduces their armor class by 2, applies a -10 penalty to their Balance skill, and renders them vulnerable to sneak attacks. A successful Reflex save negates this effect (DC 10 + Half Monk Level + Wisdom modifier + Trip modifiers). The target receives periodic saves to attempt to break free of this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Embrace the Void
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +[1/2/3] Meditation use per rest, +[1/2/3] to Dodge Cap, and regenerate Ki faster while meditating. While you are meditating, you generate a protective shield which can absorb up to [25/50/100] damage, and is refreshed every 3 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Contemplation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration and Will Saves. Rank 3: Your passive Ki regeneration is increased by 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Mystic Kata
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain an ability depending on your Light or Dark Path.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kata of Ice
EnhancementSelection.Description: You perform a melee attack that encases a tainted target in ice on a failed Will save for 10 seconds. (DC = 10 + [Str/Dex/Wis] Modifier + Monk Level + Stun bonuses). Cost: 20 Ki Cooldown: 9 seconds

Requirement.Item: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kata of Wind
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to grant you and nearby allies 20% Concealment for 60 seconds. Cost: 10 Ki Cooldown: 90 seconds

Requirement.Item: Path of Harmonious Balance: Fists of Light

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Henshin Training III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and + 2 to Damage while Centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Conditioning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Concentration and +[1/2/3] Fortitude Saves, +[5/10/15] Maximum Hitpoints.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Clear Your Mind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Battle Trance: While Centered, you gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage and the DC of Tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. The effects of this Trance are dispelled if you are no longer Centered. Activation Cost: 50 Ki. Cooldown: 20 seconds.

Stance.Name: Clear Your Mind
Stance.Description: Battle Trance: While Centered, you gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage and the DC of Tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. Every six seconds you spend Meditating using the Meditation feat restores 1 charge of this ability.

Effect.DisplayName: Henshin Mystic: Clear Your Mind (Wis Mod / 2)
Henshin Mystic: Clear Your Mind (Wis Mod / 2)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to any Ability score

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Mystic Kata Upgrade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Upgrade the Light or Dark Path Ability.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kata of Dark Stars
EnhancementSelection.Description: You use the power of the stars to set up harmonic vibrations within your enemy that force them to dance for 12 seconds. (DC = 10 + [Str/Dex/Wis] modifier + Monk Level + Stun bonuses).

EnhancementSelection.Name: Kata of Deep Magic
EnhancementSelection.Description: When you use Kata of Wind, you grant you and other allies a 25% reduction on Spell Point Cost for 60 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Henshin Training IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and +2 to Damage while Centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Mantra of Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/20] Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Centered, you and nearby party members gain a +10 Exceptional bonus to Universal Spell Power, a +5 Exceptional bonus to hit, and a +5 Exceptional bonus to Melee and Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to an Ability of your choice:

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Intelligence
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Intelligence

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Charisma
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Charisma

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Void Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +30% Damage Activation Cost: 10 Ki +1 Critical Multiplier +1 Critical Threat Range Cooldown: 3 seconds Ki Melee Attack: You have learned to make attacks backed by pure Ki energy. On Hit: +30% damage, +1 to Critical Threat Range and Multiplier, and 10d6 Force damage that scales with Melee Power. On Vorpal: Your enemy is erased from existence.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Henshin Training V
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +3 to Attack and Damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Mystic Honing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier and Threat Range while Centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Self Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +5 Magical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Cap. You gain a +25% Competence bonus to Max Hit Points

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Henshin Mystic: Balance in Dawn
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a melee attack that opposes your philosophy.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Henshin Mystic: Every Light Casts a Shadow
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +20% Damage Activation Cost: 15 Ki Cooldown: 12 seconds Ki Melee Attack: On Damage: Target suffers 1d4 Negative Levels. All nearby enemies suffer 1d2 Negative Levels.

Requirement.Item: Path of Harmonious Balance: Fists of Light

EnhancementSelection.Name: Henshin Mystic: Shadows Cannot Exist Without Light
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +20% Damage Activation Cost: 15 Ki Cooldown: 6 seconds Ki Melee Attack: On Damage: Target suffers 1d6 Light damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. This can stack up to 10 times. All allies around you receive 100 Positive Energy healing. (This healing effect is unaffected by Spell Power.)

Requirement.Item: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness
